The Fest

Farmhouse Fest is about more than just excellent beer, though it is very much about that too. It’s about having excellent beer in an excellent place with excellent people. It’s about stretching out on a sun drenched field and sipping a beer made with passion and craft. It’s about being as excited for great farmhouse ales as the brewers are. That’s why Farmhouse Fest works the way it does.

The festival takes place on UBC Farm, which is full of open space and is surrounded by nature. A beautiful, relaxing setting is the perfect place to spend a sunny afternoon. On top of that, we’ll also have plenty of water, non-alcoholic refreshments, shade, and food for you to keep yourself hydrated, cool, and fed throughout the day. More details

And many, many more…

Farmhouse Fest specializes in Saisons, Sours, and Wild Ales. You won’t find your traditional IPAs, Stouts, Light Lagers, or Pale Ales here.

What you will find are limited, vintage, or exclusive farmhouse ales and ciders that are guaranteed to keep your palate happy. To do that, we’re bringing in some of the best breweries from around BC and the world to show what they can do.

The Fine Print

All ticket sales are final. This event is 19+ only - no minors allowed. Two pieces of ID will be required for entry. Serving it Right Rules apply. Any person appearing intoxicated will not be allowed entry to the festival. We reserve the right to have security remove unruly or intoxicated persons from the festival at our discretion.
